tourBios.curYearHigh: Closed out his best performance at the PGA Professional National Champonship in June, shooting a final-round 67 at the Philadelphia Cricket Cup to T5.

tourBios.otherVics: (4): 1996 Michigan Open. 1999 Michigan Open. 2000 Michigan Open. 2013 Michigan Open.
tourBios.curYearHigh: Closed out his best performance at the PGA Professional National Champonship in June, shooting a final-round 67 at the Philadelphia Cricket Cup to T5.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Finished T32 at the Senior PGA Professsional Championship.

2013: Was T46 at the PGA Professional Championship...Won a fourth Michigan Open title but his first since 2000.

2012: Finished T15 at the PGA Professional Championship...Again played on the PGA TOUR, at the PGA Championship.

2011: Made his major championship debut, at the PGA Championship.

2000: Maxfli named him its National Player of the Year...Named the Michigan PGA Player of the Year...Successfully defended his Michigan Open title...Earned his second Michigan PGA Section Championship.

1999: Won his second Michigan Open. 

1996: Won the Michigan Open for the first time...Won the Michigan PGA Section Chajmpionship.
tourBios.personal: Worked extensively with former PGA TOUR player Ed Furgol...Is heavily involved in the renowned "Midnight Golf" program that benefits inner-city youth.
